Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
You haven't killed all the monsters. In order to become Guide of Power, you must pass the test.
Defeat monsters in the following hunting zones: Phantasmal Ridge, Enchanted Valley, Ivory Tower Crater, Silent Valley, Alligator Island, Tanor Canyon, The Forest of Mirrors, Field of Silence, Isle of Prayer, Breka's Stronghold, Sel Mahum Training Grounds, Plains of the Lizardmen, Fields of Massacre, Wasteland, Fafurion Temple, Dragon Valley. You need to get Proof of Pride - 80000 pcs.
